sentences.en: After hiking all day we finally reached the uppermost part of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 徒步走了一整天,我们终于爬到了山顶.

sentences.en: Big banks were hiking their rates up.
sentences.cn: 各大银行正在提高利率。

sentences.en: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
sentences.cn: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

sentences.en: Her own preferred methods of exercise are hiking and long cycle rides.
sentences.cn: 她自己喜欢徒步旅行和骑自行车长途旅行这样的运动方式。

sentences.en: Hiking is not yet popular in China.
sentences.cn: 徒步旅行在中国还不流行.

sentences.en: I enjoy hiking in the mountains.
I like hiking in real wilderness.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢在真正的野外徒步旅行.

sentences.en: I need to buy a new pair of hiking boots.
sentences.cn: 我需要买一双新的登山靴.

sentences.en: I think I'll pass on the hiking next time.
sentences.cn: 我想远足的事下次再说吧。

sentences.en: In addition, it's great exercise too, since we do a lot of hiking.
sentences.cn: 还有, 那也是个好的运动, 因为我们要长距离徒步旅行.

sentences.en: Incidentally, beside camping, I care mountain - climbing, hiking, traveling, etc.
sentences.cn: 顺便提一下, 除了野营, 我还喜欢爬山 、 远足 、 旅游等等.

sentences.en: Mary has always been a tomboy. She likes hiking and horseback riding.
sentences.cn: 玛丽一直很男子气, 她喜欢远足和骑马.

sentences.en: My feet are sore from hiking.
My hobbies are hiking, fishing and climbing.
sentences.cn: 我的嗜好是远足 、 钓鱼和爬山.

sentences.en: The insurers have started hiking up premiums by huge amounts.
sentences.cn: 保险公司已经开始大幅度提高保费。

sentences.en: Utah is a great place to go hiking .
sentences.cn: 犹他州是徒步旅行的绝好去处。

sentences.en: We’re going to do some hiking this summer.
sentences.cn: 今年夏天我们要去远足。

phrases.tran_cn: 去远足；去徒步旅行；徒步行

trans.tran_en: the activity of taking long walks in the mountains or country

trans.tran_cn: 徒步旅行( hike的现在分词 )，<口>提高（价格等）
